name: Preschool Program
description: City Sprouts Preschool is a Reggio Emilia inspired, emergent curriculum program. The opportunity to learn and build meaningful relationships while engaging in open-ended play, and the ability to guide the curriculum with their interests and ideas. Each child is supported in making the most of each experience through observation, documentation and guidance. City Sprouts Preschool provides organic homemade snacks and lunches for the children.
